articles.title: 'Democracy itself is in peril:' Biden delivers warning while honoring fallen service members on Memorial Day - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden commemorated those who died serving in the military in Memorial Day remarks at Arlington National Cemetery and urged Americans to honor the fallen by strengthening and protecting the nation's democracy.
